disease_name: Very long chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency

socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Very-Long-Chain Acyl-CoA Dehydrogenase Deficiency: Family Impact and Perspectives

justification: A single qualitative caregiver study from the USA (2023) reported financial constraints and impacts on ability to work but provided no quantitative cost data, indicating low evidence of socioeconomic burden.
